Legal_Name: Per OECD GloBE Information Return Section 1.3 - January 2025
Professional Practice Course: GloBE Information Return Complete Filing Implementation
Version 2.0 - Aligned with OECD XML Schema v2.0
SAMPLE ENTITIES - Replace with your group data

Change_Description: Sold to third party - exit from group
Notes: Disposed during fiscal year - report as Non-Group Member

Change_Description: Acquired from third party - new CE in group
column76: Acquired during fiscal year - report PreGloBEStatus

Trading_Name: Unique identifier for each entity - use consistent format (e.g. CE001 CE002)
Full registered legal name exactly as per incorporation documents
Trading or brand name if different from legal name
ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code (GB DE FR US etc)
Tax Identification Number - enter NOTIN if no TIN issued
Tax authority that issued the TIN

TIN: Required if jurisdiction uses postal codes

Trading_Name: GloBE status before any change during FY
Name of immediate parent for reference
Ultimate ownership percentage through chain to UPE
Is a parent entity required to apply QIIR for this CE
May UTPR apply to this CE
Is entity fiscally transparent where created
Is entity transparent in owner jurisdiction
Is entity stateless for tax purposes
Is this a PE of another entity
Entity_ID of main entity for PE
Method for attributing income to PE
Has investment entity election been made
Is entity a Joint Venture per Article 6.4
Is entity a Partially-Owned Parent Entity
Is entity in scope for GIR reporting

TIN: TRUE/FALSE - FALSE if excluded or safe harbour

Trading_Name: Is jurisdiction eligible for safe harbour
Did any change occur during fiscal year
Net book value of tangible assets (EUR)

Country_Code: Top entity in MNE group ownership chain
Standard entity included in GloBE calculations
Branch or PE treated as separate CE per Article 10.1
Parent entity less than 100% owned - may create subgroup
CE with less than 30% direct/indirect ownership
CE with no jurisdiction of tax residence
Investment fund that is the UPE

Trading_Name: All Country_Codes must be valid ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2
All Immediate_Parent_IDs must reference valid Entity_IDs

Country_Code: PE must link to main entity

Trading_Name: Change_During_FY = TRUE requires Change_Date and Change_Type
One and only one entity must have GloBE_Status = UPE
All entities must trace back to UPE through parent chain
TIN = NOTIN only if no TIN issued by jurisdiction
